title: Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee announce their engagement
text:
NRL star Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee have announced their engagement.

The 37-year-old former Sydney Roosters player popped the question with a stunning diamond ring, with their children helping with the special moment.

Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, personal trainer Rachael announced the news, with a video of Braith dropping to one knee.

She wrote: 'I'm SO in love and happy... we're getting MARRIED!'

'I'm SO in love and happy... we're getting MARRIED!' Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee announced their engagement on Tuesday... with the NRL star proposing with a stunning diamond ring and with their children by his side

How sweet! Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, personal trainer Rachael Lee announced the news, sharing a video of Braith dropping to one knee

'My amazing, love of my life and future husband and my three darling babeees (sic) surprised me w (sic) the most beautiful perfect proposal!' Rachael's post began.

'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm SO in love and happy!! We're getting MARRIED.'

She added: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

Romantic: In the clip, Braith can be seen waiting for Rachael Lee to walk outside - presumably in the beachside backyard of their eastern suburbs unit - with their children by his side

In the clip, Braith can be seen waiting for Rachael to walk outside - presumably in the beachside backyard of their eastern suburbs unit - with their children by his side.

He drops down to one knee while wearing matching T-shirts with the kids which read: 'Will U (sic) marry me.'

Braith pulls out the ring and tells her: 'I love you bubba (sic)... will you marry me?'

Time to celebrate: The pair soon embrace, with Braith unable to take his hands off his new fiancée, who cries while wearing her activewear

Look at that ring! She also shared snaps of the pair celebrating their engagement, including where she showed off her diamond sparkler as they enjoyed a meal at a restaurant with family and friends

The pair soon embrace, with Braith unable to take his hands off his new fiancée, who cries while wearing her activewear.

They soon embrace the kids, who also stood watching and holding balloons.

All the while, Extreme's More Than Words was playing in the background.

She also shared snaps of the pair celebrating their engagement, including where she showed off her diamond sparkler as they enjoyed a meal at a restaurant with family and friends.

Wedding bells! The pair are pictured celebrating with their family and friends shortly after the proposal

Braith also shared some snaps and videos to his Instagram page on Tuesday, writing: 'Today was a great day... I love you Rachael Lee. Let's do life together my baby.'

He revealed in his post that the ring was from Shannakian Fine Jewellery.

Braith - who was married to Jodi Anasta from October 2012 to December 2015 - began dating Rachael Lee in 2016.

They share daughter Gigi, one, together, while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with ex Jodi, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.
description: NRL star Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee have announced their engagement.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
